Interrupts.Name: Shadow Slip
Interrupts.Effect: Gain evasion against that attack, then after the attack resolves, teleport to the space of a shadow clone and replace it, removing the clone and gaining stealth. This interrupt can be repeated as long as there is at least one shadow clone.

Actions.Name: Shadow Stab
Actions.Effect: Teleport 1 and gain stealth. If made from stealth, can dash 2 before and after the action.

Actions.Name: Shadow Clone
Actions.Description: Summon a shadow clone in a free space in range 3.

Summon.Name: Shadow Clone
Summon.Effect: Foes adjacent to a shadow clone at the start of their turn take [fray] damage from the clone.

Actions.Name: Nocturne
Actions.Description: Teleport 8, then gain stealth and evasion until the start of the shadow's next turn.
